Verification of the source: The expert examined the source of the claim, which was a video posted by Canadian-Pakistani author Tarek Fatah. They also noted that Fatah has a history of spreading misinformation.
Comparison with other sources: The expert compared the claim with other sources, such as a tweet by a Pakistan-based news outlet and an article by OpIndia Hindi. This helped in cross-referencing the information and determining its authenticity.
Analysis of social media reactions: The expert observed the reactions of social media users to the claim. They noted that several Indian users shared the video in connection with the ongoing farmers' protest. This provided insights into how the claim was being perceived and shared by the public.
Reverse image search: The expert conducted a reverse image search using Yandex and found that the video was at least one-year-old. They also identified other users who had uploaded the same video in November 2019. This helped in establishing the timeline and context of the video.
